author: imran aziz
comment: New update has a very bad issue of loading. Whenever I open the app the loading page took very long time to open the screen. And notifications are not shown

reply.author: Freelancer.com
reply.content: Hi Imran. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues receiving notification messages. Could you send us an email at android@freelancer.com using your registered email address so that we can do some tests with your account? Thanks.

author: Rahul Mukherjee
comment: To be honest I would have rated 0 stars if possible. Projects are accepted but you cannot do anything, when you try talking to the help desk they proudly say they have some serious issues with the mobile app. So what point not fixing the app? Bids got wasted and they won't recompensate for that. Absolutely disgusted, please don't download this app its a perfect waste of time and effort.

author: Rajat Aggarwal
comment: No notifications come and this issue come again n again even update this app..I have Google pixel 2 and I don't think this is because of my phone..so can you please fix this problem.. Because of this problems come like late reply to my employers etc..ONE MORE REQUEST CAN YOU PLEASE ADD OPTION TO WITHDRAW MONEY VIA THIS APP LIKE YOU ADD DEPOSIT MONEY

reply.author: Freelancer.com
reply.content: Hi Rajat. Apologies for the inconvenience. We're aware of the issue related to adding skills through the app, and we are now working on a fix. To make sure that you don't miss out on new projects, you may bid through our mobile site. We've also released a fix to the issue with setting the notification sounds. Kindly update your app to version 3.2.6

author: Varsana tulsi Baum
comment: Won't let me bid on jobs cause it's saying I dont have a level 2 in English when I clearly do. Dosent even show you how to put that on your profile. App and website is so confusing.

author: mohammad shamshuddeen
comment: You guys doing very wrong with me. You have an issue with my employer and you guys holding my payment from last 18 days. My employer is trying to contact you but he is not getting any response from you. Are you trying to steal my money.I'll never use your platform in future or never suggest to someone. You guys doing corruption in your system by holding thousands of users payment like mine. First time i used the freelancer thing and i am very disappointed.

reply.author: Freelancer.com
reply.content: Hello Mohammad, thank you for your feedback. We would love to sort out the payment issues you're referring to. Please contact us at android@freelancer.com using your registered email address so that we can assist you at the soonest possible time. We'll look forward to hearing from you!

comment: I have a project in progress, when i tried to chat the employer i got an error said "not allowed to start a thread with this user". I kinda confused on how this work..

author: Selim Reza
comment: I like use this app for instant chat. But problem is there is no option to personalize notification sound in this version (ColorOS)

reply.author: Freelancer.com
reply.content: Hello Selim, thank you for your feedback. Please contact us at android@freelancer.com so that we can assist you right away :) Looking forward to hearing from you!

author: Abhishek Kaswan
comment: We are not getting notifications, freelancer post updates each time that bugs are fixed but still facing issue from last 4-5 months. If we don't get notifications what is the use of it.

reply.author: Freelancer.com
reply.content: Hi Abhishek, thanks for your feedback. Unfortunately, this was an error that affected some of our users. Since we have already released a fix for this, we recommend re-installing the app to see if the error gets resolved. If the error persists, please contact us at android@freelancer.com so that we can assist you further.

author: Rose Ann Joy Laspinas
comment: This app has helped me find freelance jobs. Also, I was able to help. My friends by recommending it. =)

author: Erum Ahmed
comment: More than half of your money deducted my themselves. Inshort they grab your money from your account and give you nothing. I will suggest you find your freelancer and do money deal with other ways like direct bank transfer paypal or something else like that otherwise they will grap your whole money.

reply.author: Freelancer.com
reply.content: Hello Erum, thanks for your feedback. We're sorry to hear that your experience in using our services has not been favorable for you so far. Nevertheless, would love to sort out the deductions you're referring to. Please contact us at android@freelancer.com so that we can assist you at the soonest possible time. Looking forward to hearing from you!

author: Dan Li
comment: I ve never opened this appear for a whole month suddenly it charged money from PayPal for upgrading my account! I can't contact anyone now this is a scam!

author: Oladapo Olagoke
comment: Each update comes with a new issue, now the send button freezes and messages don't deliver promptly making messages deliver like 3-5 time in repetitions

reply.author: Freelancer.com
reply.content: Hello Oladapo, your feedback is very much appreciated. This is a known issue in the app that our developers are already working on. We're hoping to include a fix in one of our upcoming releases. In the meantime, please send us an email at android@freelancer.com if you have further concerns or suggestions. We apologize for the inconvenience.

author: Ali Khalil
comment: No notifications in app. While i'm away from my laptop  at the moment. Disappointing :(

author: Grako – video VR games developer & music composer
comment: A CRITICAL ISSUE to be fixed: after updating the app it logs you out – this way I've stopped receiving notifications from my client, so I didn't know that he needed my assistance. You can only imagine the consequences! So this app does more harm to your business, than it actually helps. Another small issue: Scrolling the message you're writing in a narrow 3 line field is a real pain in the... thumb.

reply.author: Freelancer.com
reply.content: Hello Grako, thank you for your feedback. We'd like to hear more about the issues that you're encountering while using our app. Please contact us at android@freelancer.com so that we can assist you at the soonest possible time. We'll look forward to hearing from you.
